['Providing guidance will be key as you support and direct both internal and external resources in the creation of the brand marketing from concept all the way to completion.
As a strong strategic thinker, you will play a vital role in brand analysis work– including tracking volume, retail data and competitive insights.
In marketing, meeting deadlines is of paramount importance. Your clear, cogent direction will facilitate managing, coordinating and orchestrating all the elements of the brand program, including each successive component of the marketing mix.
You will assist in the achievement and tracking of volume, profit and brand health goals.
', 'You have a Bachelor’s degree in marketing or business or, better yet, an MBA. Which leaves you perfectly poised to take the next step up into other commercial leadership roles.
You have at least 3 years of marketing experience for a Consumer Packaged Goods learning organization; add in sales experience and that could push you over the top.
Even with the title of “associate,” you operate with a general manager mindset, and always approach your work as an owner of the business.
You have an innate ability to build empathy with consumers, in particular millennials and diverse consumers.
Your stock answer to the status quo is “No,” plus you constantly challenge the expected to generate new ideas and find opportunities to improve.
“Tenacious” could be your middle name, but “resilient” and “always selling” would work too. You demonstrate conviction and know how to provide and defend a strong point of view.
', 'As the world’s family brewer, we have the scale to make big things happen and still get to know colleagues on a first name basis across the globe.
We play our part to make a difference – from charitable donations to hitting the streets together to build parks – giving back to the community is part of our culture and who we are.
As a beer enthusiast, you can become a Certified Beer Cicerone through in-house training that includes everything from brewing techniques to beer tasting and food pairings.
Participation in our Total Rewards program with a competitive base salary, incentive plans, parental leave, health, dental and pension benefits.
Work within a fast paced and innovative company, meeting passionate colleagues and partners with diverse backgrounds and experiences
']
